Title: Son of Batman
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery
Writer: Bob Kane (Batman created by), Grant Morrison (graphic novel), Andy Kubert (graphic novel illustrator), James Robinson (story), Joe R. Lansdale (screenplay), Marv Wolfman (Deathstroke and Nightwing created by), George Pérez (Deathstroke and Nightwing created by), Gerry Conway (character created by: Killer Croc), Don Newton (character created by: Killer Croc)
Actors: Jason O'Mara, Stuart Allan, Thomas Gibson, Morena Baccarin
Plot: Batman learns he has a violent, unruly pre-teen son, secretly raised by the terrorist group the League of Assassins.
